title: Crime Alert 06.16.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.16.21
description:
Arizona man arrested after beating his stepson for running away from home. Woman leaves her child at social services but takes the agency's van.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
